title: Refund & Cancellation Policy
description: Refund and Cancellation Policy for Diviso

seo.title: Refund & Cancellation Policy | Diviso
seo.description: Learn about Diviso's refund and cancellation policy. Information about subscriptions, credits, and rewarded advertising.

overview.title: Service Overview
overview.content: Diviso is a digital platform designed to organize and split shared expenses. Diviso does not process money transfers, does not hold funds, and does not act as a financial intermediary or wallet provider.
overview.note: All payments made on Diviso are strictly for digital access, subscriptions, or usage-based features.

subscriptions.title: Subscriptions (Monthly & Yearly)
subscriptions.intro: Users may subscribe to optional paid plans to unlock higher usage limits or premium organizational features.

items.cancel: Subscriptions may be cancelled at any time via account settings.
items.auto_renew: Cancellation stops future billing cycles only.
items.access: Access remains active until the end of the current paid period.
items.no_refund: No refunds are issued for partially used subscription periods.

credits.title: One-Time Credit Purchases
credits.intro: Users may purchase usage credits (operations/actions) for in-app feature usage.

items.non_transferable: Credits are non-transferable and have no cash value.
items.no_withdraw: Credits cannot be withdrawn or exchanged.

rewarded_ads.title: Rewarded Advertising (Paymentwall)
rewarded_ads.intro: Diviso allows users to unlock temporary features or single usage actions by completing rewarded advertising offers.

items.no_payment: Rewarded advertising does not involve user payments.
items.no_refund: Refunds and cancellations do not apply to rewarded actions.

refund_requests.title: Refund Requests
refund_requests.intro: Refund requests are reviewed only for subscriptions or credit purchases under the following conditions:

items.timeframe: The request is submitted within 7 days of purchase.
items.unused: The subscription or credits have not been significantly used.
items.process: Approved refunds are processed through the original payment provider.

refund_requests.note: Diviso reserves the right to deny refund requests that do not meet these conditions.

payment_providers.title: Third-Party Payment Processing
payment_providers.content: All payments are processed via third-party payment providers. Diviso does not store or process payment details directly.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.intro: For refund or cancellation inquiries, contact:

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.content: Diviso does not act as a financial intermediary. Any financial settlements between users occur outside the platform.
